sections.installation:
WordPress installation:

Install Melibu WP Sharing Social Safe via the plugin directory:

WordPress (Admin-Backend) Plugin Directory

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New > search for sharing social safe
  2. Press Install Now for the Melibu WP Sharing Social Safe plugin
  3. Press Activate Plugin

or by uploading the files automaticlly to WP Plugin Directory:

WordPress (Admin-Backend)

  1. Download the Melibu WP Latest Posts Slides WP download
  2. Remove from the zip file, the version number from latest-posts-slides.1.3.zip to latest-posts-slides.zip
  3. Go to Plugins > Add New > Install
  4. Upload the latest-posts-slides.zip
  5. Press Install Now for the Melibu WP Latest Posts Slides plugin
  6. Press Activate Plugin

or by uploading the files manually to WP Plugin Directory:

Manually (FTP)

  1. Download the Melibu WP Latest Posts Slides WP download
  2. Unzip the Melibu WP Latest Posts Slides zip file
  3. Remove from the folder, the version number from /latest-posts-slides.1.3/ to /latest-posts-slides/
  4. Open your FTP Client to your Website
  5. Upload the /latest-posts-slides/ directory to the /wp-content/plugins/latest-posts-slides/
  6. Activate the plugin through the WP Plugins menu

Problems installing and updating ?

If there are problems with the installation or update, deactivate and then activate dishwasher again.
If that does not help then remove plug and re-install the newest version.

The Melibu Team
